participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, loves nostalgia and creativity.
participant_1.background: I like to watch old movies from my childhood to feel like a kid again. I learned how to use augmented reality to create immersive learning experiences for my students. i like to shop. i am an animal rights activist. I drive a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and hands-on, enjoys exploring new experiences and flavors.
participant_2.background: I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands. I have a van that has a lot of room for my cooking supplies and equipment, and for when I'm traveling. i love starbucks coffee. i am one of four children. I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.

content.text: I love to cook and create beautiful things with my hands.
Cool! I like to shop. What type of things do you like to cook?
I love to cook everything from healthy meals to desserts. I love to try new recipes and experiment with flavors.
That's awesome! I wish I was more adventurous with cooking. I usually stick to the same recipes.
It's definitely fun to try new things! I love finding new recipes and seeing how they turn out.
What's your favorite type of cuisine to cook?
I love to cook Italian food. I love the flavors and the way it makes me feel.
Italian food is my favorite too! I love pasta.
Me too! I love all types of pasta.
That would be fun! I'd love to share some of my recipes with you.
